function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Closure of small neighborhood parks impacting mental health","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workplace transmission of sars-cov-2 leading to household and community spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Architectural design issues contributing to household infections","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of stay-at-home orders to effectively curb community transmission of covid-19 due to permeability and abuse","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of grant funding for research","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission in smart working environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate supervision in partial smart working","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between indoor and outdoor green features and self-reported change in psychological outcomes related to the covid-19 lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investigation of the therapeutic benefits of indoor horticultural activities for individuals at risk, such as those with age-related diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of less wealthy population due to internet access bias","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on self-reported and brief web-based surveys","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-selection bias in online survey due to technology use","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of internationally validated measuring instruments for psychological health outcomes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of green features in the home environment may lead to a decline in psychological health during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to public green spaces during the covid-19 pandemic may impact psychological health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate interaction with green elements in the workplace may affect psychological health, especially for non-smart workers","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between indoor-outdoor green features and psychological health outcomes adjusted for covid-19 cases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effects of lockdown on individuals’ perception and behavioral adjustment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential effects of indoor and outdoor green features on psychological health outcomes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interaction of current working mode and green view affecting psychological health outcomes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent evidence on the effects of outdoor green spaces on psychological and mental health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies on the effect of green spaces on mental health when access to public residential green spaces is not allowed","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or unclear data on the prevalence of psychological health outcomes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential bias in the study participants’ reporting of psychological health outcomes","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misinterpretation of the descriptive statistics of psychological health outcomes","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through indoor plants and green spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor mental and emotional health due to lack of access to natural light and green views","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of home confinement on psychological health outcomes","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent results in literature regarding the association between indoor plants and anxiety","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between green view and psychological health outcomes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sensitivity analysis on covid-19 cases and green features","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of covid-19 pandemic among respondents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of psychological health outcomes such as anxiety, irritability, and sleep disturbance","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The presence of confirmed covid-19 cases per regional population as a potential confounding variable in the analysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The high number of positive covid-19 cases in certain regions in relation to the total population","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The division of participants into smart workers and non-smart workers based on their current working mode cwm","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Single-exposure regression analysis used to estimate associations between indoor-outdoor green features and psychological health outcomes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of covariates such as age, gender, education level, working mode, income decrease, presence of other people, and presence of pets in the regression models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of beta coefficients as a quantitative measure of the associations between green-related variables and psychological outcomes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of plant pots and green spaces may impact the transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to natural outdoor environments and road types may influence disease transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-reported increase in levels of anxiety, anger, fear, and other negative emotions during quarantine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of validated scales assessing perceived change in psychological indicators during quarantine","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential detrimental effect of quarantine on psychological health","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to presence of other people living in the home","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to presence of pets in the home","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through the completion of questionnaires and surveys","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with data protection laws and ethical standards","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of indoor plants correlated with positive emotions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to natural spaces due to mobility restrictions affecting vulnerable individuals’ psychological health","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
